Key Match Events: Kosovo secured a convincing 4-0 victory against Cyprus on 9 September, 2024.
Vedat Muriqi scored the first goal from a penalty in the 9th minute.
Vedat Muriqi scored again in the 21st minute with a header.
Albion Rrahmani scored the third goal in the 48th minute.
Lumbardh Dellova scored the fourth goal in the 55th minute.
Emir Sahiti hit the post shortly before the end of the match.
Post-Match Reflections: This victory boosts the team’s morale and demonstrates the players’ commitment to giving their best in every upcoming match.
Others: Coach Franco Foda rotated players, bringing on Ilir Krasniqi, Emir Sahiti, and Eliot Bujupi, who made his debut for the national team.
